original: @138a bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @138a bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed Noble Perfection of Wisdom!

original: tadya th'a / aom mu ni dharma /
analyzed: tadya th'a / aom mu ni dharma /

original: sa d'a a'a nu gra ha dharme /🔽bee shra ba na ba re barti ta dharme /
analyzed: sa d'a a'a nu gra ha dharme / bee shra ba na ba re barti ta dharme /

original: sarba k'arya pa ri pra ma na dharme /
analyzed: sarba k'arya pa ri pra ma na dharme /

original: sa ma t'a pa ri brta na dharme sv'ah'a /
analyzed: sa ma t'a pa ri brta na dharme sv'ah'a /

original: aom pra dzny'e shru ti smri ti bi dza ye /
analyzed: aom pra dzny'e shru ti smri ti bi dza ye /

original: dh'i:dh'a ra ni ye sv'ah'a /🔽'di bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa gzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dh'i:dh'a ra ni ye sv'ah'a / 'di bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa gzung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: dhīdharaṇīye svāhā.🔽By holding this, the Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines will be held.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa gzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa gzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The Dhāraṇī for Holding the Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines is complete.
